Translations.Text: athava avanu (bayasidare) avara karmagala karana avarannu nasamadi bidabahudu. Adare avanu heccinavarannu ksamisi biduttane
nam'ma vacanagala visayadalli jagaladuvavaru tilidirali, avarige yava asrayavu illa

(illi) nimage nidalaguttiruva pratiyondu vastuvu kevala iha jivanada (tatkalika) sottagide. Nijavagi satyavannu nambiruvavara hagu tam'ma odeyanalli bharavase ittiruvavara palige, allahana bali enideyo aduve srestha hagu sasvatavagide
avaru dodda papa krtyagalinda hagu aslila krtyagalinda dura uliyuttare mattu tamage kopa bandaga ksamisi biduttare

mattu avaru, tam'ma odeyana karege ogoduvavaru hagu namajhannu palisuvavaragiruttare. Avara vyavaharagalella paraspara samalocaneyinda nadeyuttave mattu navu avarige nidiruvudannu avaru kharcu maduttare
kedukige, astu matra keduku pratikramavagiruttade. Innu, ksamisibittu (sambandha) sudharane madikondavanige pratiphala niduva hone allahana melide. Avanu akramigalannu khandita pritisuvudilla
tanna mele akramavada balika pratikaravesagidavara mele yavude aropavilla
adare janara mele akramavesagutta, an'yayavagi bhumiyalli asantiyannu habbuttiruvavara virud'dha pratikramakke avakasavide. Avarige bhari kathina sikse kadide
sahanasilanagiddu, ksamisi biduvavanu (tilidirali); adu khandita maha sahasavagide
Allahane yarannadaru darigedisi bittare, a balika avanige yaru posakarilla. Nivu kanuviri; akramigalu sikseyannu kandaga, (illinda) maralihogalu dari enadaru ideye endu keluvaru

mattu nivu kanuviri; avarannu adara (narakada) munde hajaru padisaladaga avaru apamanadinda, dinaragi ardha tereda kannugalinda noduttiruvaru. Mattu visvasigalu heluvaru; punarut'thana dina tam'mannu hagu tam'ma bandhugalannu nastakkolapadisikondavare nijavagi nasta anubhavisidavaragiddare. Nimage tilidirali. Akramigalu khandita sasvatavada siksegolagaguvaru
allahana horatu, avarige neravagalu yava posakaru iralararu. Allahane dari tappisi bittavanige saridari sigadu
